metadata.title: Carl R. Roach, Plaintiff, Vs. Brown & Williamson Tobacco Corporation, Et Al., Defendants. Deposition of Dr. Jeffrey S. Gentry. Winston-Salem, North Carolina [Parts 1-2]
metadata.description: Deposition of Dr. Jeffrey S. Gentry in the case of Carl R. Roach v. Brown & Williamson Tobacco Corporation. Gentry answers questions about levels of nicotine in low tar cigarettes, development of Premier cigarettes, cigarette additives, in particular ammonia and use of Freon in tobacco processing. Click Here to View Part 1 Click Here to View Part 2
